Hi, I'm Jeff Scott. I teach Web Design and Programming.

I have been teaching Website Design and Development and Programming for over 30  years. Please take a look at this portfolio and let me know what you think. You can reach me at jpscott@ranken.edu 

What can i do?

Use Mobirise website building software to create multiple sites for commercial and non-profit projects.
